pytket.pauli¶

class pytket._tket.pauli.Pauli¶

__init__(self: pytket._tket.pauli.Pauli, arg0: int) → None¶
property name¶

(self: handle) -> str

class pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString¶

A string of Pauli letters from the alphabet {I, X, Y, Z},implemented as a sparse list, indexed by qubit.

__init__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. __init__(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString) -> None

Constructs an empty QubitPauliString.

  1. __init__(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString, qubit: tket::Qubit, pauli: pytket._tket.pauli.Pauli) -> None

Constructs a QubitPauliString with a single Pauli term.

  1. __init__(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString, qubits: List[tket::Qubit], paulis: List[pytket._tket.pauli.Pauli]) -> None

Constructs a QubitPauliString from two matching lists of Qubits and Paulis.

  1. __init__(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString, map: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliMap) -> None

Construct a QubitPauliString from a QubitPauliMap.

commutes_with(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString, other: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString) → bool¶

Determines whether or not two strings commute.

compress(self: pytket._tket.pauli.QubitPauliString) → None¶

Removes I terms to compress the sparse representation.
